Query: Draws all geometry that is for Query Only
Simulated: Draws all geometry that is for [Physics Collision] or [Physics Collision and Query only]
ShowHeightfields: Draws heightfields even if complex is not selected
ShowDisabledParticles: Draws all particles that are in a disabled state
ShowTriangleEdges: Draws all triangle lines that forms each geometry object. Similar to the wireframe view, but the polygons are till filled and shaded
